select new com.jshx.czrypxzs.entity.TraCer(t.id, t.areaName, t.companyName, t.certificateName, t.idCard, t.certificateNo,t.createUserID) from TraCer t where t.delFlag = 0
and t.deptId in (:deptCodes)
and t.id in (:ids)
and t.areaId = :areaId
and t.companyName like :companyName
and t.certificateName like :certificateName
and t.idCard like :idCard
and t.certificateNo like :certificateNo
and INSTR(t.companyId,:companmyIds) >0
and t.companyId = :companyId
order by t.createTime desc
